dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form
Class AbstractTreeTableRowCellEditorFactory

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.CellEditorFactory
      dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.AbstractTreeTableRowCellEditorFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
dreisoft.tresos.lib2.ui.tree.ICellEditorFactory
public abstract class AbstractTreeTableRowCellEditorFactory
extends CellEditorFactory

A TreeTableRowCellEditorFactory can be used in a SWTColumnDescription for a SWTTreeTable to create different CellEditors for each row.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Method Detail

doCreateCellEditor

public org.eclipse.jface.viewers.CellEditor doCreateCellEditor(java.lang.Object rowObject,
                                                               org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent)
Creates the cell editor to be shown.

This default implementation creates a verifying cell editor that uses the doVerifyValue() method of the ValueConverter to validate the value.

Parameters:
rowObject - The row object that represents the row (returned by SWTTreeTableController.doGetRowObject(Object, int))
parent - table composite
Returns:
the CellEditor
Since:
11

doConvertCellValueToEditorValue

public java.lang.Object doConvertCellValueToEditorValue(java.lang.Object rowObject,
                                                        java.lang.String value)
Converts the value of a cell to an editable representation. This method may be overridden. The default implementation returns the value in the same format as used for viewing.

Parameters:
rowObject - The row object that represents the row (returned by SWTTreeTableController.doGetRowObject(Object, int))
value - the value to convert
Returns:
the converted object
Since:
11

doConvertEditorValueToCellValue

public java.lang.String doConvertEditorValueToCellValue(java.lang.Object rowObject,
                                                        java.lang.Object value)
Converts an editor value to the cell value. This method may be overridden. The default implementation returns just the value.

Parameters:
rowObject - The row object that represents the row (returned by SWTTreeTableController.doGetRowObject(Object, int))
value - the object to convert
Returns:
the converted value
